author: aadamchik
msg: getting rid of BeanUtils. Woo-hoo!! No need to carry all this struts luggage just to do set/getProperty... Our own PropertyUtils are rolled out - this class won't check for DynaBean on every call :-)

author: aadamchik
msg: removing Jakarta ORO dependency... It is still bundled with Velocity jar, but no more direct references in the code. One immediate problem with it was that it had to be included in the cayenne client dependencies. Not anymore.

author: aadamchik
msg: Switching all other exceptions to 1.4-compatible form
